description:
The Haibane who has lived longest at http://anidb.net/ch26011 [Old Home]. Her friends tease Nemu because she is always sleeping, and in fact her name comes from the verb nemuru (眠る = to sleep) as she slept even in her cocoon dream.
She is a friend of http://anidb.net/ch9899 [Reki], works at the http://anidb.net/ch26017 [library], and has been a Haibane for nine years.
name: Nemu
